snippet.title: Season 3 Official Launch Trailer - The Cycle: Frontier
snippet.description:
Play NOW on Steam: https://gsght.com/c/2ibhla 
Play NOW on the Epic Games Store: https://gsght.com/c/niqnid

Season 3 is LIVE! From now on there will be no more mandatory wipes, so start fresh and on an even playing field to experience: Free Loadout Runs, Loadout Presets, The Howler, Prospect Station Upgrades, New Weapons/Ammo: MkI & MKII Variants, Anti-Cheat Improvements, Balancing Improvements, Matchmaking Updates, and a brand new Fortuna Pass with 100 new tiers of rewards to earn. The best time to explore Fortuna III is now. 

The Cycle: Frontier is more fun, exciting, and tense than ever - It's time to create the best stories with you and your fellow prospectors. 

The Cycle: Frontier is a free-to-play PvPvE first-person extraction shooter driven by suspense and danger. Prospect for resources and other riches on an abandoned alien world ravaged by a deadly storm, inhabited by monsters, and frequently raided by other ambitious prospectors. 

• Official website: https://thecycle.game 
• Twitter: https://twitter.com/thecyclegame  
• Discord: https://discordapp.com/invite/thecycle 
• Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/TheCycleFrontier 
• Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheCycleFrontier 
• Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/TheCycleFrontier   
• Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/yager_development
